devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: This library handles minting and redeeming of mStable's mUSD token.

approve(address,uint256).details: Approves tokens to the mUSD token contract without spending gas on every deposit.

params.amount: Amount of the specified token to approve to the mUSD token contract.
params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token.

getSwapFee().details: Returns the mUSD swap fee (scaled by 1e18).

mint(address,uint256).details: Mints mUSD tokens in exchange for the specified amount of the specified token.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be exchanged.
params.inputAmount: The amount of input tokens to be exchanged for mUSD.

mint(address,uint256).return: The amount of mUSD tokens minted.

redeem(address,uint256).details: Redeems mUSD tokens in exchange for the specified amount of the specified token.

params.erc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be withdrawn.
params.outputAmount: The amount of output tokens to be exchanged from mUSD.

redeem(address,uint256).return: The amount of mUSD tokens redeemed.

swap(address,address,uint256).details: Redeems mUSD tokens in exchange for the specified amount of the specified token.

params.inputAmount: The amount of input tokens to be exchanged for mUSD.
params.inputErc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be exchanged for mUSD.
params.outputErc20Contract: The ERC20 contract address of the token to be exchanged from mUSD.

devdoc.title: MStableExchangeController
